attributes.action: Hold a general election before the 31st of October
attributes.additional_details:
I’m  sick and tired the argument “if we did it again we would win” “no we would”.  

Let us have a general election and find out who would really win. let this be a final choice and let us as a nation move on. 

Those who want to remain can vote their parties and this who want to leave vote.

Let us break this deadlock and get back to sorting out the key issues of Education, youth violence, public saftey, housing and all the things that have been kept back while the commons argues over Brexit.
attributes.background:
Parliament is now in a stalemate; liberals want to remain, Jeremy Corbyn’s labour are undecided and Conservatives want to keep to the agreed EU departure date. 

the House of Commons is unable to get to work for our nation and every week bringing greater divide to what was once a United Kingdom.
